amendment.description: To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund for transferring funding for Berkeley, CA earmarks to the Marine Corps.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4380 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 79.

action.text: Amendment SA 4380 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2081-2082; text: CR 3/14/2008 S2081) To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund for transferring funding for Berkeley, CA earmarks to the Marine Corps.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4380 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 79.
